timeline.bodyText: This module needs to be added to ci-actions.yml to be included in the native test workflow. Add it to one of the Misc category (the shortest one and add 5 minutes to the timeout).
timeline.author: gsmet

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if we should make it unlisted or not? It looks like a very technical one?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: I think that there may well exist end users needing DocumentBuilder and XPath, but I have no problem to unlist if you insist on that.
replies.author: ppalaga

timeline.bodyText: Is this really needed? And if so, why?
